title: kingbob1616
author: kingbob1616
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community,Are you passionate about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology? Are you a great communicator with a knack for providing top-notch customer service? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you!We are an upcoming crypto company, committed to revolutionizing the digital asset industry. As we gear up for our upcoming launch, we are seeking talented individuals to join our customer service team.Job Requirements:Exceptional communication skills: You must possess excellent verbal and written communication skills to provide clear and concise support to our customers.Crypto knowledge: A solid understanding of cryptocurrencies, the blockchain ecosystem, and how they work is essential. Your expertise will help you address customer inquiries and provide accurate information.Customer-centric mindset: We value our customers above all else. You should genuinely enjoy interacting with people, be patient, empathetic, and able to handle various customer concerns with professionalism.Problem-solving skills: As a member of our customer service team, you will encounter unique challenges. Quick thinking and a solution-oriented approach will be key in providing exceptional support to our customers.Responsibilities:Responding to customer inquiries promptly and professionally via phone call.Resolving customer issues and complaints in a timely and satisfactory manner, escalating as necessary.Why Join Us?Opportunity for growth: As part of our early team, you will have the chance to grow professionally as the company expands, with potential for leadership roles.Competitive compensation: We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, along with performance-based incentives.Supportive team culture: Join a passionate and dedicated team where collaboration and innovation are valued.If you are enthusiastic about cryptocurrencies, possess outstanding communication skills, and are eager to contribute to our vision, we want to hear from you! This is a great opportunity for anyone with these skill sets to make it big and have a place in the crypto ecosystemTo apply, please send a message to me on telegram https://t.me/Jett_Futures or @Jett_Futures (serious inquiries only)

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: You have explained everything a person interested in joining you will need to accomplish in order to be paid for their job. That is not an issue, and you have made it understandable for anyone who is interested. However, as a newbie to the forum with no previous contributions, it appears that your organisation is not appealing to potential employees. Bumping this post again shows how eager you are to find someone to work with you. Why not look at how others that advertise work like this entice individuals to join them? You did not include a link to your website for potential applicants to peruse before expressing interest; it would be preferable if you did.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: Ndabagi01 on July 20, 2023, 08:20:46 PMYou did not include a link to your website for potential applicants to peruse before expressing interest; it would be preferable if you did. It seems that they do not have a specific project. It is a team that provides customer support to projects and companies. What they do is to recruit according to the criteria listed above and you will now work for any company they broker for.But it is correct to say that forum members are always skeptical when newbies introduces a business, product or services to them.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: There should be a point of reference on an upcoming project that they are working with, we are in a Cryptocurrency ecosystem where there are too many dubious projects, and they are asking for a corporate-like personality with high-standard qualifications so its just right that they post the name or even the website since they are using the word Quotecommitted to revolutionizing the digital asset industry so it's something that will arouse the curiosity of readers.I don't want to think that they are shilling the project because they are using the word revolutionary this word is very common on dubious projects so OP post the name or the site for us to see its potential in the industry.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I wanted to suggest that you should post this in the services section, but I see that you already have an identical, slightly newer thread there as well.I agree with the other users who want to know more about your company and its history. It's unusual that you are searching for professional and talented individuals who must be great at their job without providing more information about what you have done yourself. You should probably tell us the name of your brand, and which projects you have worked with in the past (if any)? What kind of services did you render for them and what were the results?

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: without clear details and only including a telegram link you will not be able to convince anyone to join your company. you should be able to provide more details on salary, whether you can work remotely, etc., so that it will be able to provide definite information to people who want to apply. if it's just short information related to job desc like this, I think people will think that you are not serious and ignore this thread.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: moneystery on August 01, 2023, 10:40:10 AMwithout clear details and only including a telegram link you will not be able to convince anyone to join your company. you should be able to provide more details on salary, whether you can work remotely, etc., so that it will be able to provide definite information to people who want to apply. if it's just short information related to job desc like this, I think people will think that you are not serious and ignore this thread.I agree they should drop the link or the name of the project, they will get a lot of candidates if people know exactly what they are going to work for, there are a lot of dubious Cryptocurrency projects and they don't want to be part or working with projects that is dubious, I don't want to waste my time communicating with them I hope one of those interested who message OP through telegram link will drop the name of the project and what's the project all about.
